🧭 Pathfinder Simulation

An Evolutionary Programming Approach to Multi-Objective Pathfinding

🧭 Pathfinder Simulation Project

An advanced evolutionary programming solution to the multi-objective pathfinding problem. This simulation employs discrete stochastic event modeling to evolve intelligent populations navigating through complex grid environments.

📦 Packages

Package Description
💼 io Input parsing and formatted output generation modules
🏗️ model Core domain entities: Grid, Individual, Path, Point, Population
⚡ simulation Event-driven simulation engine with PEC and event management
🔧 util Utility classes for comfort calculation and stochastic generation
🎨 visualization ASCII grid visualization with pathfinding result display

🎯 Project Objectives

  • 🎪 Develop optimal pathfinding algorithms between specified grid coordinates
  • 🚧 Handle dynamic obstacle placement and variable edge traversal costs
  • 🧬 Implement evolutionary programming with comfort-based fitness evaluation
  • ⏱️ Utilize discrete event simulation architecture with Pending Event Container (PEC)

🧬 Evolutionary Algorithm Implementation

The simulation employs three fundamental evolutionary mechanisms:

💀

Mortality Events

Stochastic death events following exponential distribution based on individual comfort levels

👶

Reproduction Events

Offspring generation with inherited path prefixes determined by parental fitness

🚶

Movement Events

Adaptive exploration of adjacent grid positions with cycle elimination

📊 Fitness Evaluation Function

Individual fitness is quantified through a comprehensive comfort function incorporating:

💰 Path cost efficiency relative to traversal length
📏 Euclidean distance optimization to target destination
⚙️ Configurable sensitivity parameters for algorithmic fine-tuning

🚀 Application Usage

🎲 Random Parameter Generation

java -jar project.jar -r n m xi yi xf yf nscz nobs τ ν νmax k μ δ ρ

📁 File-based Configuration

java -jar project.jar -f <inputfile>

🎨 Enhanced Visualization

java -jar project.jar -f <inputfile> --visualize

⭐ Key Technical Features

🎲

Stochastic Simulation

Discrete event modeling with exponential distributions

🧠

Evolutionary Fitness

Comfort-based optimization algorithms

🌡️

Population Control

Epidemic mechanisms for dynamic regulation

🎯

Multi-Objective

Balancing cost and distance metrics

📊

Real-time Monitoring

Population state tracking and reporting

🎨

Visualization

Interactive ASCII grid displays
